allow:
Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -File - <<'PSEOF'
$conns = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 2567 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
foreach \($c in $conns\) {
  $pid = $c.OwningProcess
  Write-Host "Killing PID $pid"
  Stop-Process -Id $pid -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
}
Write-Host "Done"
PSEOF)
